properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER
SELECT RNUM , MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , MEM_BIRTH , EMAIL , PHONE , ADDRESS , POINT , GRADE , ENT_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , MEM_STATUS FROM MLIST WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE PHONE LIKE '%' || ?

SELECT RNUM , MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , MEM_BIRTH , EMAIL , PHONE , ADDRESS , POINT , GRADE , ENT_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , MEM_STATUS FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , MEM_BIRTH , EMAIL , PHONE , ADDRESS , POINT , GRADE , ENT_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , MEM_STATUS FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ORDER BY MEM_NO DESC ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT RNUM , MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , MEM_BIRTH , EMAIL , PHONE , ADDRESS , POINT , GRADE , ENT_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , MEM_STATUS FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , MEM_BIRTH , EMAIL , PHONE , ADDRESS , POINT , GRADE , ENT_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , MEM_STATUS FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ORDER BY MEM_NO DESC ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT RNUM , MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , MEM_BIRTH , EMAIL , PHONE , ADDRESS , POINT , GRADE , ENT_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , MEM_STATUS FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , MEM_BIRTH , EMAIL , PHONE , ADDRESS , POINT , GRADE , ENT_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , MEM_STATUS FROM MEMBER WHERE PHONE LIKE '%' || ? ORDER BY MEM_NO DESC ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , MEM_BIRTH , EMAIL , PHONE , ADDRESS , POINT , GRADE , ENT_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , MEM_STATUS FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_NO = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET POINT = POINT + ? WHERE MEM_NO = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_STATUS = ? WHERE MEM_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM STORE

SELECT RNUM , ST_NO , ST_CONTENT , ST_TITLE , ST_PRICE , ST_QUAN , ST_PATH , ST_ONAME , ST_RNAME , ST_CATEGORY FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY ST_NO DESC) AS RNUM , ST_NO , ST_CONTENT , ST_TITLE , ST_PRICE , ST_QUAN , ST_PATH , ST_ONAME , ST_RNAME , ST_CATEGORY FROM STORE ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM STORE WHERE ST_TITLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%'

SELECT RNUM , ST_NO , ST_CONTENT , ST_TITLE , ST_PRICE , ST_QUAN , ST_PATH , ST_ONAME , ST_RNAME , ST_CATEGORY FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY ST_NO DESC) AS RNUM , ST_NO , ST_CONTENT , ST_TITLE , ST_PRICE , ST_QUAN , ST_PATH , ST_ONAME , ST_RNAME , ST_CATEGORY FROM STORE WHERE ST_TITLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ORDER BY ST_NO DESC ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
INSERT INTO STORE ( ST_NO , ST_CONTENT , ST_TITLE , ST_PRICE , ST_QUAN , ST_PATH , ST_ONAME , ST_RNAME , ST_CATEGORY ) VALUES ( SEQ_ST_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TAG WHERE TAG_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT TAG_NO , TAG_NAME , REGISTER_DATE , TAG_STATUS FROM TAG WHERE TAG_STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE TAG SET TAG_STATUS = 'N' WHERE TAG_NO = ? AND TAG_STATUS = 'Y'
INSERT INTO TAG ( TAG_NO , TAG_NAME , REGISTER_DATE , TAG_STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_TAG_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , SYSDATE , DEFAULT )
SELECT TAG_NO , TAG_NAME , REGISTER_DATE , TAG_STATUS FROM TAG WHERE TAG_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE BRD_CATEGORY = 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE BRD_CATEGORY = 2
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE BRD_CATEGORY = 1 AND BRD_TITLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%'

SELECT RNUM , BRD_NO , BRD_CATEGORY , BRD_TITLE , BRD_CONTENT , MEM_NAME , BRD_CNT , BRD_DATE , BRD_MODIFY , BRD_STATUS FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , BRD_NO , BRD_CATEGORY , BRD_TITLE , BRD_CONTENT , MEM_NAME , BRD_CNT , BRD_DATE , BRD_MODIFY , BRD_STATUS FROM BOARD JOIN MEMBER ON (BRD_WRITER = MEM_NO) WHERE BRD_CATEGORY = 1 AND BRD_TITLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ORDER BY BRD_NO DESC ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT BRD_NO , BRD_CATEGORY , BRD_TITLE , BRD_CONTENT , MEM_NAME , BRD_CNT , BRD_DATE , BRD_MODIFY , BRD_STATUS , BRD_QA_WAIT FROM BOARD JOIN MEMBER ON (BRD_WRITER = MEM_NO) WHERE BRD_NO = ?
UPDATE BOARD SET BRD_STATUS = 'N' WHERE BRD_NO = ?
SELECT RNUM , BRD_NO , BRD_CATEGORY , BRD_TITLE , BRD_CONTENT , MEM_NAME , BRD_CNT , BRD_DATE , BRD_MODIFY , BRD_STATUS FROM NLIST_M WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT RNUM , BRD_NO , BRD_CATEGORY , BRD_TITLE , BRD_CONTENT , MEM_NAME , BRD_CNT , BRD_DATE , BRD_MODIFY , BRD_STATUS FROM WLIST_M WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE BRD_CATEGORY = 2 AND BRD_TITLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%'

SELECT RNUM , BRD_NO , BRD_CATEGORY , BRD_TITLE , BRD_CONTENT , MEM_NAME , BRD_CNT , BRD_DATE , BRD_MODIFY , BRD_STATUS FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , BRD_NO , BRD_CATEGORY , BRD_TITLE , BRD_CONTENT , MEM_NAME , BRD_CNT , BRD_DATE , BRD_MODIFY , BRD_STATUS FROM BOARD JOIN MEMBER ON (BRD_WRITER = MEM_NO) WHERE BRD_CATEGORY = 2 AND BRD_TITLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ORDER BY BRD_NO DESC ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE BRD_CATEGORY = 3
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE BRD_CATEGORY = 3 AND BRD_QA_WAIT LIKE '%' || '대기' || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE BRD_CATEGORY = 3 AND BRD_QA_WAIT LIKE '%' || '완료' || '%'
SELECT RNUM , BRD_NO , BRD_CATEGORY , BRD_TITLE , BRD_CONTENT , MEM_NAME , BRD_CNT , BRD_DATE , BRD_MODIFY , BRD_STATUS , BRD_QA_WAIT FROM QLIST_M WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
INSERT INTO QA_ANS ( ANS_NO , ANS_CONTENT , ANS_DATE , ANS_MODIFY_DATE , ANS_WRITER , QA_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_QA_ANS_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , SYSDATE , SYSDATE , DEFAULT , ? )
SELECT ANS_NO , ANS_CONTENT , ANS_DATE , ANS_MODIFY_DATE , ANS_WRITER , QA_NO FROM QA_ANS WHERE QA_NO = ?
UPDATE BOARD SET BRD_QA_WAIT = '답변 완료' WHERE BRD_NO = ?

SELECT RNUM , BRD_NO , BRD_CATEGORY , BRD_TITLE , BRD_CONTENT , MEM_NAME , BRD_CNT , BRD_DATE , BRD_MODIFY , BRD_STATUS , BRD_QA_WAIT FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , BRD_NO , BRD_CATEGORY , BRD_TITLE , BRD_CONTENT , MEM_NAME , BRD_CNT , BRD_DATE , BRD_MODIFY , BRD_STATUS , BRD_QA_WAIT FROM BOARD JOIN MEMBER ON(BRD_WRITER = MEM_NO) WHERE BRD_CATEGORY = 3 AND BRD_QA_WAIT LIKE '%' || '대기' || '%' ORDER BY BRD_NO DESC ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MOVIE

SELECT RNUM , M_CODE , M_TITLE , M_GENRE , M_DIRECTOR , M_DATE , M_COUNTRY , M_IMAGE , M_SUMMARY , M_RATING , M_GRADE , STATUS FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , M_CODE , M_TITLE , M_GENRE , M_DIRECTOR , M_DATE , M_COUNTRY , M_IMAGE , M_SUMMARY , M_RATING , M_GRADE , STATUS FROM MOVIE) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MOVIE WHERE M_TITLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%'

SELECT RNUM , M_CODE , M_TITLE , M_GENRE , M_DIRECTOR , M_DATE , M_COUNTRY , M_IMAGE , M_SUMMARY , M_RATING , M_GRADE , STATUS FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , M_CODE , M_TITLE , M_GENRE , M_DIRECTOR , M_DATE , M_COUNTRY , M_IMAGE , M_SUMMARY , M_RATING , M_GRADE , STATUS FROM MOVIE WHERE M_TITLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%') WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT TAG_NAME , M_CODE , M_TITLE , M_GENRE , M_DIRECTOR , M_DATE , M_COUNTRY , M_IMAGE , M_SUMMARY , M_RATING , M_GRADE , STATUS FROM MOVIE LEFT JOIN MOVIE_TAG USING(M_CODE) LEFT JOIN TAG USING(TAG_NO) WHERE TAG_NAME IS NULL )

SELECT RNUM , TAG_NAME , M_CODE , M_TITLE , M_GENRE , M_DIRECTOR , M_DATE , M_COUNTRY , M_IMAGE , M_SUMMARY , M_RATING , M_GRADE , STATUS FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY M_CODE DESC) AS RNUM , TAG_NAME , M_CODE , M_TITLE , M_GENRE , M_DIRECTOR , M_DATE , M_COUNTRY , M_IMAGE , M_SUMMARY , M_RATING , M_GRADE , STATUS FROM MOVIE LEFT JOIN MOVIE_TAG USING(M_CODE) LEFT JOIN TAG USING(TAG_NO) WHERE TAG_NAME IS NULL ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT M_CODE , M_TITLE , M_GENRE , M_DIRECTOR , M_DATE , M_COUNTRY , M_IMAGE , M_SUMMARY , M_RATING , M_GRADE , STATUS FROM MOVIE WHERE M_CODE = ?
INSERT INTO MOVIE_TAG ( TAG_NO , M_CODE ) VALUES ( ? , ? )

SELECT RNUM , TAG_NAME , M_CODE , M_TITLE , M_GENRE , M_DIRECTOR , M_DATE , M_COUNTRY , M_IMAGE , M_SUMMARY , M_RATING , M_GRADE , STATUS FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY M_CODE DESC) AS RNUM , TAG_NAME , M_CODE , M_TITLE , M_GENRE , M_DIRECTOR , M_DATE , M_COUNTRY , M_IMAGE , M_SUMMARY , M_RATING , M_GRADE , STATUS FROM MOVIE LEFT JOIN MOVIE_TAG USING(M_CODE) LEFT JOIN TAG USING(TAG_NO) WHERE TAG_NO = ? ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MOVIE LEFT JOIN MOVIE_TAG USING(M_CODE) LEFT JOIN TAG USING(TAG_NO) WHERE TAG_NO = ?
SELECT TAG_NO , TAG_NAME , M_CODE FROM MOVIE_TAG LEFT JOIN TAG USING(TAG_NO) WHERE M_CODE = ? AND TAG_STATUS = 'Y'
DELETE FROM MOVIE_TAG WHERE TAG_NO = ? AND M_CODE = ?
